verses.verse: "Speak <S%H1696><s%> to Aaron, <S%H175><s%> and to his sons, <S%H1121><s%> and to all the children <S%H1121><s%> of Israel, <S%H3478><s%> and say <S%H559><s%> to them: <S%H1697><s%> 'This is the thing which Yahweh <S%H3068><s%> has commanded, <S%H6680><s%>

Whatever <S%H376><s%> man <S%H376><s%> there is of the house <S%H1004><s%> of Israel, <S%H3478><s%> who kills <S%H7819><s%> a bull, <S%H7794><s%> or lamb, <S%H3775><s%> or goat, <S%H5795><s%> in the camp, <S%H4264><s%> or who kills <S%H7819><s%> it outside <S%H2351><s%> the camp, <S%H4264><s%>

and hasn't <S%H935><s%> brought it to the door <S%H6607><s%> of the Tent <S%H168><s%> of Meeting, <S%H4150><s%> to offer <S%H7126><s%> it as an offering <S%H7133><s%> to Yahweh <S%H3068><s%> before <S%H6440><s%> the tabernacle <S%H4908><s%> of Yahweh: <S%H3068><s%> blood <S%H1818><s%> shall be imputed <S%H2803><s%> to that man. <S%H376><s%> He has shed <S%H8210><s%> blood; <S%H1818><s%> and that man <S%H376><s%> shall be cut off <S%H3772><s%> from among <S%H7130><s%> his people. <S%H5971><s%>

This is to the end that the children <S%H1121><s%> of Israel <S%H3478><s%> may bring <S%H935><s%> their sacrifices, <S%H2077><s%> which they sacrifice <S%H2076><s%> in the open <S%H6440><s%> field, <S%H7704><s%> that they may bring <S%H935><s%> them to Yahweh, <S%H3068><s%> to the door <S%H6607><s%> of the Tent <S%H168><s%> of Meeting, <S%H4150><s%> to the priest, <S%H3548><s%> and sacrifice <S%H2076><s%> them for sacrifices of peace <S%H8002><s%> offerings <S%H2077><s%> to Yahweh. <S%H3068><s%>

The priest <S%H3548><s%> shall sprinkle <S%H2236><s%> the blood <S%H1818><s%> on the altar <S%H4196><s%> of Yahweh <S%H3068><s%> at the door <S%H6607><s%> of the Tent <S%H168><s%> of Meeting, <S%H4150><s%> and burn <S%H6999><s%> the fat <S%H2459><s%> for a pleasant <S%H5207><s%> aroma <S%H7381><s%> to Yahweh. <S%H3068><s%>

They shall no more sacrifice <S%H2076><s%> their sacrifices <S%H2077><s%> to the goat <S%H8163><s%> idols, <S%H310><s%> after which they play the prostitute. <S%H2181><s%> This shall be a statute <S%H2708><s%> forever <S%H5769><s%> to them throughout their generations. <S%H1755><s%>'

"You shall say <S%H559><s%> to them, <S%H376><s%> 'Any man there is of the house <S%H1004><s%> of Israel, <S%H3478><s%> or of the strangers <S%H1616><s%> who live as foreigners <S%H1481><s%> among <S%H8432><s%> them, <S%H5927><s%> who offers a burnt offering <S%H5930><s%> or sacrifice, <S%H2077><s%>

and doesn't <S%H935><s%> bring it to the door <S%H6607><s%> of the Tent <S%H168><s%> of Meeting, <S%H4150><s%> to sacrifice <S%H6213><s%> it to Yahweh; <S%H3068><s%> that man <S%H376><s%> shall be cut off <S%H3772><s%> from his people. <S%H5971><s%>

<S%H376><s%>"'Any man of the house <S%H1004><s%> of Israel, <S%H3478><s%> or of the strangers <S%H1616><s%> who live as foreigners <S%H1481><s%> among <S%H8432><s%> them, <S%H398><s%> who eats any kind of blood, <S%H1818><s%> I will set <S%H5414><s%> my face <S%H6440><s%> against that soul <S%H5315><s%> who eats <S%H398><s%> blood, <S%H1818><s%> and will cut him off <S%H3772><s%> from among <S%H7130><s%> his people. <S%H5971><s%>

For the life <S%H5315><s%> of the flesh <S%H1320><s%> is in the blood; <S%H1818><s%> and I have given <S%H5414><s%> it to you on the altar <S%H4196><s%> to make atonement <S%H3722><s%> for your souls: <S%H5315><s%> for it is the blood <S%H1818><s%> that makes atonement <S%H3722><s%> by reason of the life. <S%H5315><s%>

Therefore I have said <S%H559><s%> to the children <S%H1121><s%> of Israel, <S%H3478><s%> "No person <S%H5315><s%> among you shall eat <S%H398><s%> blood, <S%H1818><s%> neither shall any stranger <S%H1616><s%> who lives as a foreigner <S%H1616><s%> among <S%H8432><s%> you eat <S%H398><s%> blood. <S%H1818><s%>"

<S%H376><s%>"'Whatever man there is of the children <S%H1121><s%> of Israel, <S%H3478><s%> or of the strangers <S%H1616><s%> who live as foreigners <S%H1481><s%> among <S%H8432><s%> them, <S%H6718><s%> who takes in hunting <S%H6679><s%> any animal <S%H2416><s%> or bird <S%H5775><s%> that may be eaten; <S%H398><s%> he shall pour <S%H8210><s%> out its blood, <S%H1818><s%> and cover <S%H3680><s%> it with dust. <S%H6083><s%>

For as to the life <S%H5315><s%> of all flesh, <S%H1320><s%> its blood <S%H1818><s%> is with its life: <S%H5315><s%> therefore I said <S%H559><s%> to the children <S%H1121><s%> of Israel, <S%H3478><s%> "You shall not eat <S%H398><s%> the blood <S%H1818><s%> of any kind of flesh; <S%H1320><s%> for the life <S%H5315><s%> of all flesh <S%H1320><s%> is its blood. <S%H1818><s%> Whoever eats <S%H398><s%> it shall be cut off. <S%H3772><s%>"

<S%H5315><s%>"'Every person that eats <S%H398><s%> what dies <S%H5038><s%> of itself, <S%H2966><s%> or that which is torn by animals, <S%H249><s%> whether he is native-born or a foreigner, <S%H1616><s%> he shall wash <S%H3526><s%> his clothes, <S%H899><s%> and bathe <S%H3526><s%> himself in water, <S%H4325><s%> and be unclean <S%H2930><s%> until the evening: <S%H6153><s%> then he shall be clean. <S%H2891><s%>
But if he doesn't <S%H3526><s%> wash them, <S%H7364><s%> or bathe his flesh, <S%H1320><s%> then he shall bear <S%H5375><s%> his iniquity. <S%H5771><s%>'"
